definition: A highly skilled individual who possesses extensive knowledge, expertise, and experience in a particular field or profession. This term is commonly used to refer to someone who is considered an expert or professional in their respective domain.

examples.german: Er ist ein Profi in seinem Fach.
examples.english: He is a professional in his field.
She is an experienced professional athlete.

examples.german: Der Profi hat den Wettbewerb gewonnen.
Als Profi muss er hart trainieren.
examples.english: As a professional, he has to train hard.

examples.german: Der Profi kennt sich bestens aus.
